name: It's raining presents
description:
Submission for the 5th Winter Game Jam
https://itch.io/jam/5th-winter-game-jam

GAMEPLAY:
- Collect presents and bring them to your house
- Make sure to check out the contents of the present 
- Don’t let the badgers steal from you
- And if they do, steal right back

Controls:
Movement: WASD
Pick up: E
Look Inside: F
Pause: ESC

PITCH:
Oh no. Santa Claus has been drinking again and started throwing the presents out of his sled instead of placing them safely under your tree. Now you need to collect them from your garden so your children can have a wonderful christmas. But beware, the local population of badgers are also trying to give their kids a christmas filled with presents, so you better be fast. Also, with Santa Claus drinking as much as he does, better check the contents of the presents as well before giving your 4yo a chainsaw with a cute ribbon on it.

Made by
https://i-am-fabii.itch.io/
